titleStmt.title: Certaine and good news from the west of Ireland and city of Cork sent in a letter from John Davis ... ; concerning the taking and besieging of the town of Dungarven and the overthrow of many hundred of the Irish rebells ; with some other shirmishes as they marcht from Youghall.
titleStmt.author: Davis, John, Attendant on Sir Charles Vavasour.
